text: Rebecca Schaeffer (November 6, 1967 â€“ July 18, 1989) was an American actress. She began modeling before beginning an acting career. She starred as Patricia "Patty" Russell in the sitcom My Sister Sam in the late 1980s. The sitcom aired for two seasons. She played Stephanie in The End of Innocence. ==Life== Schaeffer was born in Eugene, Oregon. ==Killing== On July 18, 1989, Schaeffer was shot to death in Los Angeles, California, by an obsessed fan who had stalked her for almost three years. == Other websites == * *The Rebecca Schaeffer Website - In Memoriam Category:1967 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Actors from Oregon Category:American movie actors Category:American murder victims Category:American television actors Category:Murdered actors Category:Murders by firearm in California Category:People from Eugene, Oregon Category:People murdered in California
title: Rebecca Schaeffer
